attributes.action: Parliament should be prorogued and the law enacted to leave the EU on 12:04/2019
attributes.additional_details: Referendum result to Leave. Both major parties campaigned in the general election to leave. Parliament voted to leave. We are now facing an endless delay dictated to us by the EU.
attributes.background: The people voted to leave the EU, as did Parliament and as the members of Parliament cannot bring themselves to abide by these votes, we hold them in contempt, and no longer should they stand in the way of the law.
